                      <gmd:URL>http://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdo-web/datasets</gmd:URL>                                     </gmd:linkage>                                     <gmd:protocol>                         <gco:CharacterString>Description</gco:CharacterString>                                     </gmd:applicationProfile>                                     <gmd:name>                                         <gco:CharacterString>Monthly Summaries Description</gco:CharacterString>                                     </gmd:name>                                     <gmd:description>                                         <gco:CharacterString>Monthly summaries provides monthly temperature and precipitation averages and extremes (when these elements are observed) using global daily data. The observations are computed from World Meteorological Organization, Cooperative, and CoCoRaHS networks and are computed once per month.</gco:CharacterString>                                     </gmd:description>                                     <gmd:function>                                         <gmd:CI_OnLineFunctionCode codeList="http://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/metadata/published/xsd/schema/resources/Codelist/gmxCodelists.xml#CI_OnLineFunctionCode"                                                                codeListValue="information">information</gmd:CI_OnLineFunctionCode>                                     </gmd:function>                                 </gmd:CI_OnlineResource>                             </gmd:onlineResource>                                    <gmd:hoursOfService>                                 <gco:CharacterString>8:00 - 5:00 Eastern</gco:CharacterString>                             </gmd:hoursOfService>                         </gmd:CI_Contact>                     </gmd:contactInfo>                     <gmd:role gco:nilReason="missing"/>                                            </gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty>                </gmd:citedResponsibleParty>               <gmd:presentationForm>                  <gmd:CI_PresentationFormCode codeList="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/resources/Codelist/gmxCodelists.xml#CI_PresentationFormCode"                                                codeListValue="tableDigital">tableDigital</gmd:CI_PresentationFormCode>               </gmd:presentationForm>             </gmd:CI_Citation>          </gmd:citation>          <gmd:abstract>             <gco:CharacterString>Monthly Summaries of Global Historical Climatology Network (GHCN)-Daily is a dataset derived from GHCN-Daily. The data are produced by computing simple averages or monthly accumulations of the daily observations. The meteorological elements calculated for the data set include, but are not limited to: monthly maximum and minimum temperature, monthly precipitation (i.e., rainfall and snow water equivalent), snowfall and snow depth. Users of these monthly summaries have access to simple meteorological summaries for tens of thousands of stations worldwide.</gco:CharacterString>          </gmd:abstract>          <gmd:purpose>             <gco:CharacterString>Monthly summaries are created to meet the needs of a diverse array of users in the public and private sector. By bringing together contributions from dozens of national and international sources, this dataset helps users understand today's climate and how it impacts society while helping users prepare for weather and climate conditions in the future. With thousands of stations available, providing a combination of historic and near real-time observations, users have access to an extensive collection of data that can be used at both the local and national level.</gco:CharacterString>          </gmd:purpose>          <gmd:status>             <gmd:MD_ProgressCode codeList="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/resources/Codelist/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_ProgressCode"                                  codeListValue="completed">completed</gmd:MD_ProgressCode>
